changelog:
#update #MiMiX2 #chiron

Current build date: 02/16/2019
firmware *REQUIRED* : V10.0.2.0
Minimum recovery required : TWRP 3.2.3 (Wight554's one) or latest OrangeFox (R9.0-1)

Changelog:

- Version 2.3
- Lockscreen visualizer
- Fixed media art cover
- Fixed some status bar clock issues
- OP like gestures tweaks
- Ability to turn off conditions/suggestions in settings
- CAF touch response optimization
- Launcher: switch to latest LawnChair v2
- Update translations
- Filemanager (DocumentsUI) fixes
- Other fixes and improvements

Download: Check OTA or use the direct link: https://sourceforge.net/projects/syberiaos/files/chiron/syberia_chiron-v2.3-20190216-1051-OFFICIAL.zip/download
